unit: Unit 4 | Probability, Random Variables, and Probability Distributions
title: Expected Number: Mean Chimpanzees
question_text: Chimpanzees love bananas and also love to fight over them.  A chimpanzee has a $5$ % chance of being able to eat a banana before another chimpanzee steals it from him. Assuming the chimpanzees are independent of one another,  how many chimpanzees do we expect it takes for one â€‹to finally eat a banana?
